summary: Tom Sizemore stars in the most explosive Behind Enemy Lines yet! Seal Team 8 must fight their way through the Congo to defuse one of the greatest threats the world has ever known.
cast: Tom Sizemore|Lex Shrapnel|Anthony Oseyemi|Michael Everson|Darron Meyer|Aurélie Meriel|Colin Moss|Langley Kirkwood|Tanya van Graan|Keeno Lee Hector|Leroy Gopal|Bonnie Lee Bouman|Dylan Edy|Warrick Grier|Sebelethu Bonkolo|Glen Biderman-Pam|Eugene Khumbanyiwa|Luversan Gerard
title: Tras la línea enemiga: Comando de élite
